DOC.brief_summary: A 2-group healthy volunteer study compare breath actuate inhaler ( BAI ) pressurise meter dose inhaler ( pMDI ) without spacer .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic/Pharmacodynamic Inhaler Comparison Study Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Group 1 ass pharmacokinetics , Group 2 ass pharmacodynamics . PK interim analysis determine requirement PK extension . Group 1 ( PK ) blood sample safety assessment 36 hour post-dose 3 study period . Results PK stage determine Group 2 ( PD ) require . Group 2 ( PD ) ass LABA effect ( confirm interim analysis ) . Group 2 ( PD ) include 2 overnight stay 5 study period . Volunteers receive single dose study medication , discharge Day 2 . Study treatment fluticasone/formoterol BAI , fluticasone/formoterol pMDI with/without spacer , formoterol alone without spacer , low dose fluticasone/formoterol without spacer . Volunteers undergo blood sampling , safety assessment morning discharge . An inspiratory flow recorder ( IPR ) use train monitor inspiratory flow rate , inhale volume inhalation technique .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age 18 year . Healthy free significant abnormal finding determine medical history , physical examination , vital sign , laboratory test ECG . Normal lung function ( FEV1 > 90 % predict normal value ) . Demonstrate satisfactory technique use study drug device . No use steroid medication ( systemic topical ) within 8 week prior study screen . Subjects use asthma medication knowingly regularly expose asthma medication . Any history drug alcohol abuse . Any history condition might interfere drug absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion . History asthma , COPD , bronchial lung disease . User steroid medication ( systemic topical ) within 8 week prior study screen .
